anti-adblock-pass__section-1__heading.message: Unlock your favorite content, without the annoying ads or turning off your ad blocker

anti-adblock-pass__section-1__subheading.message: Enhanced pop-up blocking, faster page load times, and better privacy protection

anti-adblock-pass__section-2__heading.message: More sites are asking users to disable ad blocking extensions

anti-adblock-pass__section-2__paragraph-.message: Pop-ups asking to turn off their ad blocker are becoming more common on the web. But you don’t have to put up with annoying - sometimes dangerous - ads just to get to the content you want. With Adblock Plus Premium you can surf the web and see fewer of these anti-adblocker messages, while enjoying the same browsing experience.

This is experimental, and while we’re working on you seeing even fewer anti-adblock pop-ups, you will still encounter some on the web. We are able to offer this by contributing a portion of your Premium subscription through Flattr. Learn more

anti-adblock-pass__plan-2__subheading.message: Block additional distractions, including floating videos, newsletter pop-ups, and more

anti-adblock-pass__tip-1__paragraph-1.message: See fewer ads while you surf the web without turning off Adblock Plus.

anti-adblock-pass__tip-1__paragraph-2.message: We are able to help you see less anti-adblocker messages by distributing funds to websites through Flattr.

anti-adblock-pass__section-4__article-1_.message: Some websites will ask you to turn off your ad blocker so they can serve you ads. With premium, you will see fewer ads without turning off Adblock Plus.

anti-adblock-pass__section-4__article-2_.message: Take control of your browser and browse the way you want to! Say goodbye to newsletter pop-ups, floating videos, and other annoying distractions with Distraction Control.

anti-adblock-pass__section-4__article-3_.message: We are a small team and your support allows us to create a distraction-free and worry-free internet experience for everyone. Help us keep ABP going for years to come and get access to more features as we release them.
